alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 21 at 5:36PM PST until December 21 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Areas of east to southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. There will be local gusts to 55 to 60 mph in the most wind-prone locations and near heavier showers. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast, Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast, Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range and Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
